title: List of banned subreddits part 3 (promoting hate)

author.bio_html:
I don’t like pedos

http://chng.it/jpN9JXJc

body: It’s a shame banbigmouth was banned.It wasn’t even a hate sub.It was just a sub discussing how concerning the show was and why it should be off air.If there’s another sub like banbigmouth on here I would like to know
body_html: It’s a shame banbigmouth was banned.It wasn’t even a hate sub.It was just a sub discussing how concerning the show was and why it should be off air.If there’s another sub like banbigmouth on here I would like to know

guild.description:
We track and discuss banned, privated, and quarantined Ruqqus guilds, Reddit subreddits, and saidit communities.

We are not a hub for banned communities to congregate, nor do we endorse the creation of alternate communities to banned or quarantined ones.

Rules:
 - Follow Ruqqus ToS
 - Follow posting format (titles must refer to the name of the guild, subreddit, community of interest that is either of the following: banned, quarantined, or privated; image or description must contain proof of the event)
 - No reposts allowed.

guild.name: Reclassified
